name: Tsubasa
info:
An opportunist who trims her sails with the wind. Proactive, talkative, and loves to hang out.
She makes friends easily and doesn't get angry even when someone points out her opportunistic tendencies. She also has an open mind that is always taking in new and different ideas.
On the other hand, she is definitely not the kind of person who provides a sense of security.
description:
Hane's résumé shows that she spent some time at the Astra Shelter, was once a Hyena officer, and was an employee at Hykros, which her Simulacrum data is based on.
After that, she chose to betray Hykros and joined the Heirs of Aida.
The only word to describe her would be "unstable." No one knows what she's up to right now, but we can be sure that with her abilities, she is definitely not just a foot soldier in the Heirs.
She does not pick sides according to ideals, right or wrong, objectives or rules, as if none of these matters to her. She belonged to so many organizations, but she also didn't belong in any of them.

skills.name: Quickdraw
skills.description: While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 48.8% of ATK plus 3. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 43.7% of ATK plus 2. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 78.6% of ATK plus 4. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 121.2% of ATK plus 6. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 112.5% of ATK plus 6 and knock the target back a short distance.

skills.name: Charged Arrow
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack. Deal base damage equal to 87.8% of ATK plus 5, and 50% more for each 1 second spent charging, up to 3 seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weak point, and knock the target down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

skills.name: Arrow Rain
skills.description: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to 287.2% of ATK plus 15 area damage to targets.

skills.name: Air Volley
skills.description: While airborne, use normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 56.3% of ATK plus 3. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 74% of ATK plus 4. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 112.7% of ATK plus 6. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 169.8% of ATK plus 9.

skills.name: Loaded Arrow
skills.description: Tap attack after dodging to trigger a Loaded Arrow, which knocks the target back and deals damage equal to 124% of ATK plus 7.

skills.name: Piercing Shot
skills.description: Perform a backflip and fire 3 piercing shots, with the main shot dealing damage equal to 258.3% of ATK plus 14, and the other two shots deal 60% damage. In addition, knock targets back and stun them for 5 seconds if they collide with an obstacle. Cooldown: 12 seconds.

skills.name: Explosive Barrage
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the wielder, and create a hailstorm at the target location, dealing damage equal to 570% of ATK plus 30. The storm has a 10% chance to strongly freeze the target for 2 seconds. Gain cold front, and increase speed by 45% for 7 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Ice Shell
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly freeze targets for 2 seconds and leave them frostbitten for 6 seconds. Breaking the ice shell deals damage equal to 151% of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by 50%.

advancement: Grant a stack of Sharp Arrow each time the arrow fired by a Dodge attack hits a target. Each stack increases damage by 5% for 15 seconds. Stack up to 3 times.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Launching a Dodge attack fires 3 Charged Arrows.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.
Double duration of Arrow Rain and slow targets by 25%.
Sharp Arrow stacks up to 5 times. Hitting a target with a Charged Arrow immediately grants 3 stacks. Headshots grant 5 stacks.

traits.name: Rainstorm
traits.description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain 1 stack of Fierce Strike, up to 1 stack per 1 second. Each stack adds 0.5% ATK, up to 15 stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.

traits.name: Raging Waves
traits.description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain 1 stack of Fierce Strike, up to 1 stack per 1 second. Each stack adds 0.6% ATK, up to 30 stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.
